name: Waffle Bot
description:
What is that robot waffling about!?  

The more drinks you supply him with the more he'll babble until you can figure out what he's bleeping about!  Drag and drop the ingredients into the blender and drop the drink on his face.  Type your guess into the top box and check to see if you're right!  Be quick though, it's almost closing time and you only have a minute!

***this is my first ever game jam!  So apologies in advance if I compiled/uploaded wrong.  It's a learning experience!
